Digital Analytics Solutions - Tailored to You

As an experienced Digital Analytics Consultant and Google Cloud Certified Professional Data Engineer, I help businesses harness the full potential of their data through customized analytics solutions and data-driven strategies.

Contact Services

Your Digital Analytics Strategy - Covered

Leveraging your digital analytics effectively and activating your data is crucial for business success. However, navigating the complexities of analytics platforms like Google Analytics, Amplitude, Piwik Pro, Google Tag Manager can be challenging. Adding Customer Data Platforms like Mixpanel, Heap, Lytics, to the mix, combine these with working with raw data in BigQuery and you have a daunting task in front of you.

As a Digital Analytics Consultant and Analytics Engineer, I specialize in designing and implementing tailored analytics and activation solutions that align with your business goals. With my expertise in digital analytics platforms, tag management, and Google Cloud Platform-based solutions I ensure that your data infrastructure is not only robust and scalable but also delivers actionable insights to drive your business forward.

Your Digital Analytics Implementation & Strategy - Tuned for Success

I work flexibly to meet your specific needs, whether you require end-to-end management of your analytics infrastructure or ongoing support in leveraging your existing resources. My services include:

  • Optimizing your digital analytics setup (e.g., Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager) continuously for accurate data collection and insightful reporting.
  • Developing custom analytics solutions using JavaScript, SQL, and Python to address unique business requirements.
  • Building scalable data pipelines and advanced analytics solutions using GTM Server-Side and Google Cloud Platform services.
  • Providing training and support to help your team maximize the value of your analytics tools.
  • Offering strategic advice on digital marketing strategies informed by data-driven insights.

Strategic Analytics Solutions

I collaborate with organizations to align their business objectives with tailored digital analytics strategies, addressing unique challenges and driving data-informed decision-making.

My approach ensures that your analytics setup is not only technically sound but also aligned with your business goals, maximizing the impact of your data and unlocking actionable use cases.

Your Consultant & Engineer - Who am I?

I'm Gunnar Griese, a self-employed Digital Analytics Consultant and Analytics Engineer based in Copenhagen, and work through 8-bit-sheep. With a strong background from leading digital analytics agencies in Germany and Denmark, I've helped large enterprises and brands optimize their digital analytics strategies.

My expertise spans various industries, and I'm passionate about helping businesses of all sizes activate their data efficiently. I am also the responsible lecturer for the courses "Technical Digital Analytics" and "Tag Management" at IHM Business School in Malmö, introducing students to the intricacies of digital analytics.
